description: The Snaptastic Orange Flame Snapdragon is an amazing species of flower. Its bright, vibrant bloom gives an instant pop of color to any garden. Its striking orange petals have a flame-like pattern that stands out against the foliage and other flowers. The Snapdragon blooms from late spring through early summer and grows to about 18 inches tall. Its distinctive leaves are lance-shaped and provide a backdrop for the colorful petals. With its low maintenance and long blooming period, the Snaptastic Orange Flame Snapdragon is an ideal choice for any garden.
